item.title: Despite Past Mismanagement, Feds Keep Wasting Millions On N.C. Red Wolf Experiment
item.description: 'It is about government overreach and squandering money on a failed and illegally run program,' said landowner Jett Ferebee.

item.title: ProPublica Awarded Pulitzer After Blaming Georgia Woman’s Abortion Pill Death On Pro-Life Laws
item.description: If Americans needed further proof that the Pulitzer Prize has become nothing more than a glorified gold sticker given to the media’s biggest left-wing...

item.title: CBS’s 60 Minutes Invites Russia Hoax Architect Marc Elias To Attack Trump
item.description: Scott Pelley’s 60 Minutes segment on Sunday started with a disclaimer, as if he knew the segment critical of President Donald Trump’s executive order ...

item.title: HUD Probes Whether Pronoun, Vaccine Police Discriminated Against Christians
item.description: The agency, acting on President Trump's executive order, is asking employees to document discriminatory practices in the Biden years.

item.title: J6 Prosecutors Brag To Congress About Locking Up Americans For Misdemeanors
item.description: The prosecutors who dedicated themselves to getting Jan. 6 convictions cannot fathom that they were heavy-handed and unjustly charged too many people.
